DOC.brief_summary: Ivabradine may be better than Metoprolol for controlling heart rate before Coronary CTA.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Efficacy of Ivabradine Versus Metoprolol
DOC.criteria: elective patient on scheduled for 640 slices CT coronary at Phramonkutklao hospital Resting heart rate > 70 BPM age > 18 years and informed consent Heart rate > 100 BPM BP <100/60 mmHg recent congestive heart failure in 1 mo. SA node, AV node disease and AF on permanent pacemaker CrCL < 15ml/min. , AST or ALT > 3x UNL on HR reducing drug such as diltiazem, verapamil, digitalis contraindication for ivabradine or metoprolol
